title: The Flying Pigskin Show: Andy Dalton is ______.
content:
TAMPA, FL - Andy Dalton looks to the sideline after being sacked by outside linebacker Lavonte David #54 of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in the first quarter on Aug. 24, 2015. (Photo by Cliff McBride/)
